data.title: Yet Another Bench Script (YABS)
data.description: Creator and maintainer of the YABS Linux server benchmark script, which estimates performance of a Linux machine using fio for disk speed tests, iperf3 for network speed tests, and Geekbench for CPU/system performance.

data.title: PLEXiDRIVE
data.description: Created extensive bash scripts to automate the process of uploading video media to a cloud provider (i.e. Google Drive) as a way to store Plex content

data.title: pyPatrol
data.description: A service monitoring node using Python and Sanic to monitor uptime of various services (ping, http responses, tcp sockets, steam game servers, and more!)

data.title: Game Panel Modules
data.description: Custom modules to run game servers within a Pterodactyl Game Panel.

data.title: Warband Banners
data.description: This little project scrapes stats of a running Mount and Blade Warband game server to populate a server banner to display within game forums, websites, etc. to show live server stats.

data.title: Holdfast Banners
data.description: This project stemmed from the Warband Banner Generator project and simply adapted it for Holdfast: Nations at War servers. This uses a Steam server query library for Python to get the live server stats.

data.title: License Verification Bot
data.description: Simple Discord bot that will verify WHMCS and Blesta billing panel licenses.

data.title: This Site
data.description: This site was first designed and crafted by Cassidy Williams and is a fork of her original site. With a couple of tweaks, I adapted the site for my needs (replacing a couple sections and fiddling with the JavaScript). The overall theme and feel were mostly kept intact.
